recommended_degree: Akuntansi Keuangan Perusahaan, Analisis Keuangan, Ekonomi, Keuangan dan Perbankan, Keuangan, Akuntansi Keuangan (Sarjana)
job_description:
* Follow up on missing expense documents from users
* Check the completeness of Vendor Bill documents (invoice, delivery order, bank account details, stamp duty, etc.)
* Follow up on missing Vendor Bill documents with the Procurement Department
* Check the completeness of credit card transaction documents (invoice, receipts, proof of payment, refund documents, etc.)
* Follow up on outstanding credit card transaction documents that have not been submitted (via email or in person)
* Follow up on outstanding Accounts Receivable (AR)
* Respond to student/parent emails regarding tuition fee confirmation and payment receipt requests
* Coordinate with the Supervisor (SPV) and Head of Department (HoD)
* Generate the monthly initial budget report
* Create Budgetary Position for new budgets (projects)
* Create Budget Control for new budgets (projects)
* Provide supporting documents for the External Audit process
